gain.name: Health
gain.description: Gain a Healing dice or healing surge for every 2 levels (same as a short rest)

gain.name: Food
gain.description: Gain 2d6 + proficency bonus in pounds of food and gallons of water

gain.name: Godliness
gain.description: Improve Piety with a chosen God by one

gain.name: Henching
gain.description: Recruit a hench-thing limited by charisma. Normal costs and generation method

gain.name: Factional Mission
gain.description: Gain access to a Factional Mission. Defeat the next 6 encounters with a long rest to gain profiecincy bonus Gain to Factional Reputation.

gain.name: Downtime Opportunity
gain.description: Choice of downtime activities for 7 days, normal rules apply.

gain.name: Mystical Empowerment
gain.description: Choose Spell of tier cast, class ability regained, or used free

tiers.value: Level 1 ability or spells(0+1) Mending, Good Berry, Cure Wounds, Identify
Level 5 ability or spells(2+3) Lesser Restoration, Healing Spirit, Aid, Continual Flame,  Remove Curse
Level 7 ability or spells(4) Fabricate, Cure Wounds (@lv 4), Secret Chest, Faithful Hound, Private Sanctum
Level 9 ability or spells(5) Awaken, Greater Restoration, Hallow, Legend Lore, Reincarnation, Seeming, Raise Dead, Planar Binding
Level 11 ability spells(6) Contingency, Create Homunculus, Create Undead, Forbiddance, Druid Grove, Instant Summons,  Disintegrate, Find the Path, Heroes Feast, Heal, Magic Jar
